messages.subject: 3 new images in PHOTOS
messages.msgSnippet: Tama contributed photos of: Nakajima NObori s wife and grave Harada s wife, Masa...and the girl next to her is adorable! And Tainoshin Shinohara + Wife +
messages.messageBody:
Tama contributed photos of:
Nakajima NObori's wife and grave
Harada's wife, Masa...and the girl next to her is adorable!
And Tainoshin Shinohara + Wife + Grandson
from
Rekishi Dokuhon
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000678JHS/qid%3D1099500083/sr%3D1-1/ref%3Dsr%5F1%5F8%5F1/250-6260947-0281024

go to the PHOTOS folder, click on Shinsengumi + Related Peopled...the
3 new images should show up last

all 3 images have the magazine ISBN # on them...I think if you are
going to make a purchase you should list the books you want or music
cds you want and buy everything at once to save on shipping.

I secretly pray that KON ICHIKAWA's (director of MANY great films such
as Burmese Harp and the KEY) ANIMATED FILM "SHINSENGUMI" is released
on DVD so I can buy everything at once....
